panels.description: Shows completed exchanges of the camel context in the time range
panels.title: Completed
Camel Context Overview - RED (Rate - Errors - Duration)

targets.expr: sum by(routeId) (irate(camel_exchanges_total{camelContext="$context", routeId=~"$route"}[$__interval]))

panels.description: Show the numbers of exchanges per second for camel route $route
panels.title: Ex/sec

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (camel_exchanges_inflight{            

            routeId=~"$route",
            camelContext=~"$context"
        })

panels.description: Average execution time for a route
panels.title: Avg Exec time $route
